Biscay.text:
Wind
In north, northwesterly 5 to 7 decreasing 3 to 5, backing southerly 5 to 7 later, perhaps gale 8 later. In south, westerly or northwesterly gale 8 to storm 10 decreasing 5 to 7, then becoming cyclonic later.
Sea state
In north, rough or very rough, occasionally high at first. in south, very rough or high, becoming rough or very rough later.
Weather
In north, showers, then rain later. In south, thundery showers.
Visibility
In north, good, occasionally poor. In south, moderate or poor.
